article: an insurance salesman from las vegas pleaded guilty thursday to one count of conspiracy to commit securities fraud in connection with insider trading based on information supplied by a former lawyer at cravath , swaine & moore , a new york law firm .
abstract: guilty plea in insider trading case involving law firm
